channel.title: Project Remix 639
channel.description:
Project Remix 639 Is Back!
Features:
Green= Finished Blue= In Progress Red=Not Started Yet
Combat:
Perfect Pvp System Pvp Drops Soulsplit Working on monsters AND pvp
NPC:
Ice Strykewyrms Frost Dragons Nomad Corp like real rs. Full nex with sounds
Big Features:
Polypore Dungeon Dominion Tower
More features maybe in future.
Updates: [code]23-02-12 Added Cc Colors. 23-02-12 Added Ice Strykewyrms 24-02-12 Added Loyalty Titles 24-02-12 Added Frost Dragons 25-02-12 Fixed torva health, added Nomad drops korasi. 25-02-12 Added Shops zone 25-02-12 Added Ancient Cavern[/code]
Spots:
Programmers:
1.Mitch 2. -
Website Developers:
1. - 2. - 3. -
Application Format:
[code]Name: Staff Account Name (If Accepted): Coding Experience: Position Applying For: Tell me about yourself (RSPS Related): Do you know any other coding languages? e.g. C++, Python, etc: Msn: Skype: Email: Available Work Hours:[/code]
My msn:
[email]Mitch2334@live.nl[/email]
My skype:
itz.chrisje
Email:
[email]mitch2334@live.nl[/email]
If u have any questions add me on msn or skype.

item.title: Project Remix 639
item.dc:creator: @Skyru Skyru
item.description:
@Skyru wrote:

[quote=“mitchymaster, post:9, topic:434141”]Sorry guys had alot of college this week, will be coding ALOT this weekend, alot of updates Need a web dev,assist coder wud be nice u got my details.[/quote]Alright, can’t wait to see more updates.

item.title: Project Remix 639
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I suggest at most you have 2 web developers, who are on at different times. Because when you’re planning on having 3 people working on a certain amount of pages and someone changes something, everything flares up, personal experience.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Remix 639
item.dc:creator: @Skyru Skyru
item.description:
@Skyru wrote:

[quote=“neroxx, post:2, topic:434141”]1. Replace “Coder” with “Programmer”.
2. Add more information about what the server contains.
3. Dont add a link to the forum if you not are allowed of a moderator. (it would be advertising)[/quote]Cool it with the bold letters, mkay?
Anyways, looks good. There hasn’t been any updates in a couple of days, that worries me!

Read full topic
